ygData.subject: Re: Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s funny to see things cast upon you too when a person is charmed. Tashan, mob glances around nervously to you, but: You hear the barking of Tashan, to
ygData.messageBody:
> OK that explains why Largos was sticking better. I saw the "mob glances
> around nervously" message every time we fought something. Didn't know that
> was the message for Tashan though.

It's funny to see things cast upon you too when a person is charmed.

Tashan, mob glances around nervously to you, but:

You hear the barking of Tashan, to the victim.

If you were curious as to why the npc was glancing around it's because
a big freaking wolf/dog is chasing it (in it's mind). Why this lowers
magic resistance I have no idea ;-)

Harmonic.
